import React, {Component} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; class Read extends Component{ render(){ const {books} = this.props const read = books.filter((book)=>(book.shelf.toLowerCase()==="read")) return (
{console.log(read)}

Read

    {read.map((book)=>(
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ))}
) } } export default Read
